title: How Our Screen Detox Led to a Calmer, Happier Home and a Screen-Free Summer
description: We recently did a screen detox for our kids and we couldn’t BELIEVE the results. As a result, we’ve declared it a screen-free summer full of lots of fun activities! A few weeks ago, I started noticing something in our home — something that made me pause. Our younger kids were whinier and more argumentativeRead More
author: Crystal Paine
